name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a pan, sauté garlic in olive oil until golden. Add red pepper flakes, cooked pasta, and parsley. Toss and serve.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella. Arrange on a plate, alternating slices. Top with basil, drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Sauté garlic and ginger in olive oil. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender. Add soy sauce, cook for another minute, and serve hot.

name: Chicken Quesadilla
instructions: On a tortilla, layer chicken, cheese, bell pepper, and onion. Top with another tortilla. Cook in a skillet until cheese is melted and tortillas are golden. Serve with salsa.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: Sauté garlic in butter until fragrant. Add shrimp, lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Cook until shrimp is pink. Garnish with parsley.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. Add milk, eggs, and melted butter. Stir until smooth. Cook on a griddle until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer until tomatoes are soft. Blend until smooth and season with salt, pepper, and basil.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados and mix with lime juice, chopped onion, cilantro, jalapeño, and salt.

name: French Toast
instructions: Whisk eggs, milk, cinnamon, and vanilla. Dip bread slices into the mixture and cook in butter on a skillet until golden on both sides. Serve with syrup.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop vegetables and mix with olives and feta. Drizzle with olive oil, sprinkle with oregano, and season with salt and pepper.

name: Bruschetta
instructions: Toast baguette slices. Mix diced tomatoes, minced garlic, basil, olive oil, and balsamic vinegar. Spoon the mixture onto the toasted baguette slices.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Cream butter and sugars. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt. Stir in chocolate chips. Scoop onto a baking sheet and bake.

name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss chopped romaine with croutons and grated Parmesan. Drizzle with Caesar dressing and serve.

name: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Spread tomato sauce on pizza dough, top with mozzarella and basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and bake until crust is golden.

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend banana, strawberries, yogurt, honey, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.
